content: marilyn s spa mitt this is a bag/sac that you can put a bar of soap in or can use as a washcloth size small approximately 4x4 5 inch large approximately 5 x 5 5 inches small large is in materials one skein of worsted weight cotton i m using universal clean cotton gauge 20 sts per 4 inch not critical needles u s 6/4 00mm with a 32 or 40 inch cord for magic loop us 5 or 6 dpn for icord abbreviations k = knit p = purl k2tog = knit 2 together yo = yarn over ptbl = purl through back loop round = round knitting all the way around on both needles back to the tail this pattern starts with judy s magic cast on i purl the first round instead of knit i like this for the bottom of the bag this is suzanne bryan s video of judy s magic cast on which i like as very clear and does not put the stitches on backwards https //youtu be/j5mamefalew sihi=cbnangtutkpbbtpw pattern cast on 40 50 stitches using judy s magic cast on there will be 20 25 stitches on each needle round 1 purl to the last stitch on needle 1 ptbl continue on 2nd needle to last stitch and again ptbl this tightens the last stitch so the sides are not stretched only on the first round round 2 knit round 3 purl repeat round 2 & 3 for approximately 3 5 4 inches after a few rounds i put a pin in marker as my start of the round this will be by the tail of your work knit 3 rounds next round k3 yo k2tog repeat to end of round knit 3 rounds for the top edging knit 6 rnds of garter rnds purl knit purl knit purl knit bind off finishing knit approximately a 9 10 inch icord weave the icord through the eyelets in the stockinette section once woven through join the icord weave in ends this is a free pattern so please use for personal use only and should not be used for items for sale
